data.name: GWENT: Rogue Mage - Deluxe Edition Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
A special offer for those who wish to go the extra mile on their adventure. This upgrade allows you to unlock all bonuses of the Deluxe Edition including:
Singleplayer campaign bonuses:
- The Official Soundtrack
- 3 alternative looks for Alzur to use in your playthrough
Multiplayer bonuses for GWENT: The Witcher Card Game:
- Yamurlak Board
- 4x GWENT: Rogue Mage Cardbacks
- "First Witcher” Title
- 5x Ultimate Premium Kegs
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This content requires the base game GWENT: Rogue Mage on STEAM in order to play.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (8, 10)
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 | AMD A4-7300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 | Radeon R7 240
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (8, 10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 | AMD Radeon R7 265
